review: I've had it for just over 3 weeks and enjoy it so far. While there are some grips about what can and cannot be streamed to my tv I do really enjoy the item. Thanks again google, you're amazing.
author: damien glenn

review: Google Chromecast HDMI Streaming Media Player was a great buy, worked exactly as described. It needed more instructions with it than was included, but the website was a lot of help.
author: Lois Sergent

review: I spend more time searching for the chrome cast signal than I do watching anything via a connection. I am constantly unplugging it or disconnecting from my wifi and reconnecting for it to cast. I'd rather deal with cable customer service than this thing if that tells how frustrating the pos is.
author: Bryan Smith

review: This product is great in concept, but the software in chromecast lets down.I have been a user for 2 weeks now. The installation went smoothly.When i tried to stream YouTube videos from my chrome browser in windows PC to TV, it worked for few minutes then session froze. I tried restarting many times, but every-time same behavior. I also tried with macbook pro also, then sometimes it would not even cast it. Hopefully over the period of time, software in it will improve and we will have better user experience.
author: keane_gr8

review: Worked for 5 seconds and then...ker-plunk. Support said to fill out a form for the return and they'll send a replacement. The link to submit the return form didn't work. Just like the Chromecast. *sigh*
author: West

review: Makes everything so much easier when you have friends over, instead of being huddled over the phone, we are sitting around the tv!
author: Big Pompa

review: This is a fantastic product and "just works" right out of the box but really limited app support outside of a few apps like Netflix, Youtube, etc. Supposedly now that the dev tools are being re-released we'll see more apps. Just as a youtube player it is pretty good -- far better than the embedded youtube player in my Tivo, and unlike hooking my ipad up via HDMI dongle, actually plays the videos fully full screen.
author: Mr. Shiney

review: Nice Device. But just after I bought mine for $33.3, the price dropped to $29. That kinda disappointed me :) Otherwise, it's a great device.
author: Comwiz "AK"

review: Disappointing. Tried it at my friends. Buggy, you get what you pay for. Cheap product, hence why it's cheap. I then got Apple which is flawless and just works so easily. Roku I'd recommend as well based on people I know who have used it, but those I know who have both prefer apple. (Not sure why they own both).
author: Michael R. Randall

review: Great to send movies that you can watch on Chrome to your tv. Or just using the internet and browsing on the tv instead of the laptop. In addition to HBO go, etc from your phone. Very easy to use. Don't buy from best buy--->$75.00+ rip off there. $35.00 is a very reasonable price.
